subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The San Antonio Spurs, led by Manu Ginóbili’s chaotic style and unique acting ability, drove the Utah Jazz into fits of frustration, and then to the edge of playoff elimination.
snippet: The San Antonio Spurs, led by Manu Ginóbili’s chaotic style and unique acting ability, drove the Utah Jazz into fits of frustration, and then to the edge of playoff elimination.
